page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: Television is received on BBC1,BBC2, STV and CHANNEL 4. A survey of 105 households showed 35 had videos and 10 had computers. A survey done from the newsagent's showed the top six newspapers taken daily to be, The Courier & Advertiser- 170,The Daily Record -54,The Daily Express -35,The Sun - 33,The Scotsman- 27 and The Times -12. The top six Sundays are The Sunday Post -185,The Sunday Mail -60,The Sunday Express -42,The Sunday Times and The Sunday Telegraph both 16 and The News of the World -15. The Courier and Advertiser and The Sunday Post are both from the local stable of D,C.Thomson of Dundee.
